article: french president jacques chirac said saturday that the u.n. 's nuclear watchdog would determine the ambitions of iran 's nuclear program , steering clear of the tough line taken by his foreign minister who recently called it a clandestine weapons program .
abstract: chirac says france 's position is unchanged on iran 's nuclear program
